LanguageData.Insulation_Cold.label: Insulation - Cold
LanguageData.Insulation_Cold.description: How much this apparel offsets a wearer's minimum comfortable temperature when worn.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Sharp.label: Armor - Sharp
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Sharp.description: Armor against sharp damage like bullets, knife stabs, and animal bites.
LanguageData.Insulation_Heat.label: Insulation - Heat
LanguageData.Insulation_Heat.description: How much this apparel offsets a wearer's maximum comfortable temperature when worn.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Blunt.label: Armor - Blunt
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Blunt.description: Armor against blunt damage like club attacks, rock falls, and explosions.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Heat.label: Armor - Heat
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Heat.description: Armor against temperature-related damage like burns.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Electric.label: Armor - Electric
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Electric.description: Armor against electric damage like EMP pulses.
LanguageData.PersonalShieldEnergyMax.label: Shield max energy
LanguageData.PersonalShieldEnergyMax.description: The maximum energy a personal shield can have at one time. More energy can absorb more damage.
LanguageData.PersonalShieldRechargeRate.label: Shield recharge rate
LanguageData.PersonalShieldRechargeRate.description: The rate at which a shield gains energy as long as it is not broken.
